Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Came highly recommended. Very cool place for authentic Indonesian food. You get the full experience, I just let the staff order for me and it was perfect thank you

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: One of the best. Full and distinctive flavours in all of their fishes. Very friendly staff and interested in your experience. Highly recommended.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Authentic and delicious 😋 rice table was a fabulous variety to try.  Excellent service 👍

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: The beef rendangis tender, the seasoning is not stingy with spices..the chicken soup is awesome, the shrimp soup is also recommended..the perfect choice to fulfill the longing for Indonesian cuisine

Name: Long Pura

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Brilliant service and food. Try the Goat Satay! It's amazing!

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: This is very close to having a traditional Indonesian Rijsttafel.  Food was really tasty, 4 courses including dessert.  Cost was about 50 euro per person.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Great Indonesian food with a variety of set menus.  Friendly staff who gave us good service.  Only disappointing thing was that the white wine was warm when poured out at room temperature.  They did give us an ice bucket to chill the rest of the bottle.

Review Text: Great Indonesian food with a variety of set menus.  Friendly staff who gave us good service.  Only disappointing thing was that the white wine was warm when poured out at room temperature.  They did give us an ice bucket to chill the rest of the bottle.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: The very best off the best in Indonesian cooking and rijstafel. A yearly must do when we visit The Netherlands.servixe is tops. The price is well worth the trip.....of the senses

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: I have to visit Long Pura every time I come to Amsterdam. Ignore everything else on the menu and choose from their selections of Rijst Tafel. Absolutely delicious. Although the goat sate was the highlight of the meal.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Friendly staff. The guy at the entrance helped me through the menu and catered for my vegan food request. Definitely a hallmark of my visit to Amsterdam. Would come back again for sure.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Nice Indonesian restaurant with a beautiful interior. Be advised to not get seated near the door during winter, because you will get cold. Better to get a seat in the back. …

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: The atmosphere is spot on in this Indonesian restaurant. The food was ok. We had the larger rijsttafel, we loved this fish, goat and shrimp dishes however the beef and lamb dishes were way over cooked. They were almost dusty. The veggie dishes were pretty bland. I expected more from the food.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Good services dor their guests. Food was delicious

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: All the food was delightful and the service was nice, just be prepared to spend €50 per person. It's worth it if you can afford it.

Review Text: Did the Rijst Tafel with 2;  NOT one dish was poor. Al with distinct own flavor…wonderful. Recommended!!

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Very welcoming staff and great hospitality, food has a good standard in terms of quality and price, quite happy with the experience, thank you

Review Text: Delicious and good portions! Definitely recommend.

Review Text: Great food, great ambiance, great staff!!!! Best Indonesian food in Amsterdam

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Food was absolutely excellent! First time eating Indonesian food and it was delicious. We asked for most of it not spicy but honestly even the spicy beef wasnt too "hot" - it had GREAT flavor. Would definitely go back.

Review Text: Overrated, super slow service, food options some are okay other are bad.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: This restaurant was quite full when we entered, but the friendly staff was able to accommodate us. We ordered the "rijsttafel met saté". Lovely authentic Balinese food presented very well with an explanation given with every dish. Very nice atmosphere. Well worth a visit.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Excellent Satay. Chicken Satay was delicious and so was the tofu Satay. The king prawns skewers were also great. …

Review Text: We ordered the rice table. We waited 1,5 hours for it to come and it was not even very good. It was edible and nobody died, so 2 stars and not 1.

Review Text: I had been at this place as a first timer to taste Indonesian food. I had tried vegetarian options and they were really good. The ambience was also satisfactory. …

Name: Long Pura
Review Text:
VERY mediocre and very overpriced.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Long Pura … loooooong waiting to get served

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Westernized Indonesian food.  Spicy isn't actually spicy, although YMMV.  But - nothing negative to say.  Get one of the "samplers" - rather than order a specific dish from the menu if you are new to the cuisine.   A good mix of Dutch and tourists.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Not impressed, if Indonesian food is meant to be served luke warm with several dishes looking like brown mush and not a lot of flavour then I've incorrectly rated Long Pura and I should have given it 5 stars. The service was quite good but we won't be returning.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Super flavorful Indonesian cuisine. We had the ricetable, as recommended to try many dishes as prepared similar to how they served Dutch royals back historically. We also ordered the goat satay, one of their specialties, and was not …

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Came here in summer 2015, and recently again in summer 2019. Food still good as I recalled it - Rijsttafel in Amsterdam is always an experience with the various vegetable and meat dishes combined with sauces. Also nice to have southeast Asian food once in a while to break from the European cuisine during visits here.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Really long wait times. We were a party of five and ordered the 3 cours ricetable. It took forever to come out. Not a lot of food in the end for 37 euros. Also at the time I felt they had missed some dishes out. When I got home and checked …

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Great first experience with Amsterdam-Indonesian "rice table" dining.  Received multiple dishes (>10) as part of the family style dining, all fantastic. Would definitely return. …

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: A very good restaurant: quick service, the staff speaks really good English, the food is amazing, great flavor combinations. If you know nothing about Indonesian food like I did, go for a rice table, it has a variety and you can pick whatever you like

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: If you want to be teleported to Indonesia, there is no better place in Amsterdam. Rice in banana leaf is amazing.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: First time I had Indonesian food . I believe it was the best restaurant to get introduced into the food. The restaurant was perfect , the waiters where very friendly , the manager was fantastic , the prices were reasonable . An AMAZING restaurant with GREAT food, I had a great time.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Now, honestly. I rarely leave reviews unless I feel compelled by outstanding quality or the opposite. This place is the complete opposite and a complete rip-off. We've been having absolutely amazing meals all weekend for two for €50-€60 …

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: The food is very good. The rendang meat is very soft, the opor meat is also soft. They make the food adapted to European customers that are not able to eat spicy. The waiter is very friendly. But here is a bit pricey in my opinion.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Great food. Good variety. Nice curries and rendang with out being too sweet or spicy. Spot on. Also this restaurant had the best service of anyplace I’ve stopped in Europe. Very attentive. 10/10 would recommend.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: I am an indonesian but i don’t recommend this restaurant. I have a bad experience my first time coming here, the female waitress was completely rude and talking back during her service. Her attitude and response was not professional. She really gave a bad impression to indonesia. The waitress was never apologetic with her bad service.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Underwhelming. We ordered the rijstaffle & almost every dish served was a stewed type dish (flavour was a little muted, but OK) The only exception was the gado gado (a little too wilted, seemed like it had been left out too long) & the …

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Our party of 4 had reserved prior to arrival.From the outside looked uninviting,,however the inside was a transformation. We enjoyed their rice table for 4 at 25 euros per head.The service was a pleasure, with smiling attentive staff.the …

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Very tasty food. We had the ricetable and found there was plenty of choice, from mild vegetable dishes to quite spicy meat dishes. Friendly staff and reasonably priced for the amount of food you get.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Really enjoyed our first experience of Indonesian cuisine. All the waiters were very helpful and the ambience was cultured!  Would recommend this sophisticated restaurant to all visitors of Amsterdam :)

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: We had a late ish evening and found this lovely joint by chance. The food was excellent. We had a fish sambal that was to die for and the duck dishes were awesome too. Definitely recommended.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: This meal was INSANELY good. Every dish was perfect. The sauces for the lamb and chicken satays were unlike anything I've had before. I'm super bummed we went here on our last night in Amsterdam because I want to go back!!

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Very good food. The rice was great and both the chicken a prawn dish were delectable. Spices were spot on with the heat at a perfect level as to not destroy the taste. Highly recommended.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Nice place to grab a beer or a simple quick bite. Food is yummy, good beer selection, acceptable prices. Nice coffee shop right across the street.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Absolutely delicious. Friendly service. Really lovely food and a rather scrumptious cocktail, what more can you ask? …

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Just what we needed after a flight. We ordered vegetarian coconut soup and some spring rolls and shared a main dish which was plenty. Very nice food and ambience.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Long Pura is conveniently located in the Jordaan district and easily accessible by foot from most key spots in Amsterdam.  Decor is ethnic.  Servers greet customers nicely and are dressed in Indonesian garb.  Food is delicious, particularly …

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: The best Indonesian restaurant in Amsterdam. As a native Indonesian I find it very difficult to find restaurant that really understand the real Indonesian taste but Long pura defenitely nailed it. The foods tasted so good and remains me so …

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Simply excellent. Place was full. Service was prompt and helpful and the food was superb. The spicy eggplant dish ranks alongside anything I have tasted. Highly recommended.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: We had a good time, the Bali cocktail was to my tatste. Food is sometimes too spicy but de knew it in advance. A place to consider.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: After some debate online as to which is the best Indonesian restaurant in Amsterdam and visits to a couple (Blauw, Sama Sebo, Kantjil en de Tijger), we decided to try out Long Pura which has been refurbished fairly recently. The food …

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: This experience was amazing.  Go for the "chef's rice table" and split among friends.  Tons of amazing food and flavors.  Remember that they prefer to only accept a single card for payment!

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Excellent food. Great service. Ordered the warung sate which is amazing, but make sure you order "2x" for 2 people... We got one serving even though there were 2 of us. …

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: This a fantastic local restaurant that serves the best Indonesia food! They even accommodate dietary restrictions such as no peanuts or dairy. Extremely delicious and a good place to eat with friends

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Nice interior and very friendly staff. The food served is good but I know a couple of other Indonesian restaurants that do better. The portions were rather small.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Massively overpriced. 30% more than other, better places - go to Ron's gastropub first. Chairs and tables budget style - cocktails are mostly water and ice.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Authentic Indonesian restaurant for dinner. Go for the tasting menu, even the smallest, vegetarian one is a generous meal. The only downside is that we had to wait an hour for our food.

Name: Long Pura
Review Text: Well cooked Indonesian food. Friendly staff.

Name: Long Pura
